name: Connect Pipes - Classic Puzzle
description:
Tapping pipes has never been more addictive or fun! Plumber pipes puzzle game offers a big number of challenges to connect pipes to get the water flowing!
Connect Pipes is a plumber puzzle game where you have to rearrange the pipes' positions to create correct flows from the main fountain to the last pipe line. Observe the positions carefully to determine the correct path and tap to change a pipe's position. Remember that the starting pipes can be rearranged, but the destination one cannot.
Download now and play against! How quick can you solve every level? Enjoy three game modes (easy, normal and hard) and more than 50 levels! Get ready for countless hours of fun and boost your logical thinking by challenging yourself to arrange loads of pipe lines to get the water flowing.
Test yourself!
developers: Pocket School - Basic education to learn for adults & kids
